Description of incident: ReverbNation was contacted by law enforcement regarding an unauthorized access to their customer data sometime in January of 2014. The individual who accessed this information was caught and charged. The customer information this individual may have viewed included email addresses and encrypted passwords, names, addresses, phone numbers, and/or dates of birth.The company automatically reset users passwords to combat those customers who used a common password. According to the company no credit card information was accessed as they do not store that information on their servers. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-57665
